name: Music_639.wav
keywords: ['electropop song', 'fuzzy bass', 'shaker', 'simple percussion', 'male voice', 'female backing voice', 'synth sounds', 'moderate tempo', 'narrative mood']
caption: This song features a male voice and a female voice singing together. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat. A shaker is played once on the count and twice on the end of each count. The bass plays a melody using a fuzzy tone. A synth holds chords in the background. The mood of the singers is narrative. This song can be played in a mystery movie.
